description: Ubuntu is one of the most popular linux distributions available today. Cloud computing is currently one of the hottest technology topics. This presentation will demonstrate several use cases of Ubuntu in cloud computing from simple single server setups to complex deployments in both public and private settings. You will learn where Ubuntu fits in a public cloud offering as well as learn how Ubuntu Enterprise Cloud can transform your datacenter into a well-oiled private cloud.
title: The Ubuntu Storm - Cloud Computing with Ubuntu
